Wind
In northwest, southwesterly, veering northerly later, 3 to 5. In southeast, variable 2 to 4, becoming northerly or northwesterly 3 to 5, occasionally 6 later.
Sea state
Slight or moderate.
Weather
In northwest, occasional drizzle later . In southeast, fair.
Visibility
In northwest, good, occasionally moderate later. In southeast, good.
